page.title: 11Foote Farm (page 2)
page.content: He sells his fat bullocks for Â£600 to Â£700.Mr Norman milks his cows twice a day but some farmers milk them three times a day.He feeds his cows in winter on hay,sugarbeet and 16 percent protein cake.Mr Norman's bullocks eat about 4,000 bales of hay and about 1,000 bales of straw each year.The hay takes up about 23 acres of land.To get the germs out of the milk he uses detergent to clean off the udders and he sterilizes the units at 75 degrees. Mr Norman has not got a bull he has only got cows.British Friesians give about 5 gallons of milk a day. Mr Norman often has lambs which have lost their mothers and they are fostered by other sheep or Mr Norman looks after them.
